price: Puis leur succédèrent des générations qui délaissèrent la prière et suivirent leurs passions. Ils se trouvèrent en perdition,
arabic: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakhalafa min baʿdihim khalfun aḍāʿū al-ṣalata wa-ittabaʿū al-shahawāti fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
